import React,{Component} from 'react' import "./Today.css" import SideBody from './sideBody/SideBody' import News from './news/News.js' import axios from 'axios'; class Today extends Component { getLocation() { var x = document.getElementById("demo") if (navigator.geolocation) { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(this.showPosition); } else { x.innerHTML = "Geolocation is not supported by this browser."; } } showPosition(position) { var latitude=position.coords.latitude var longitude=position.coords.longitude this.setState({ latitude:position.coords.latitude, longitude:position.coords.longitude }) const x = document.getElementById("demo") x.innerHTML = "Latitude: " + position.coords.latitude + "
Longitude: " + position.coords.longitude; } constructor() { super() this.state = { latitude:'', longitude:'', searchByLL:"", id:"", } this.getLocation= this.getLocation.bind(this) this.showPosition= this.showPosition.bind(this) } getLocation() { var x = document.getElementById("demo") if (navigator.geolocation) { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(this.showPosition); } else { x.innerHTML = "Geolocation is not supported by this browser."; } } showPosition(position) { var latitude=position.coords.latitude var longitude=position.coords.longitude this.setState({ latitude:position.coords.latitude, longitude:position.coords.longitude }) const x = document.getElementById("demo") x.innerHTML = "Latitude: " + position.coords.latitude + "
Longitude: " + position.coords.longitude; } componentDidMount (){ this.getLocation() if(this.getLocation()){ const dataLol= 'http://api.apixu.com/v1/current.json?key=82fe923258fa4530a5e235322192604&q=' + this.state.latitude + ","+ this.state.longitude axios.get(dataLol) .then(response => { this.setState({ data: response.data.location}) }, () => console.log(this.state ) ) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); } else { console.log("no") } } render () { {this.getLocation()} return(
